#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int gtob(int a, int b, int& c)
{
	if(a==0)
		return 0;
	int g=(a%2)^gtob(a/2, b*2, c);
	c += g*b;	 
	return g;
}		 
int main()
{
	int t,n,ans;
	char g;
	t=0;
	while((g=getchar_unlocked())!='\n')
		t = t*10 + g-'0';
		
	while(t--)
	{
		ans=n=0;
		while((g=getchar_unlocked())!='\n')
		n = n*10 + g-'0';
		gtob(n,1,ans);
		printf("%d\n", ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
